A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
News just leaked from the studios: in the next movie the Porgs will have Force powers.
Of course they will not need any training in it before using it proficiently. It's so trendy!
The Porgs have been chosen to represent the new Jedis because they do not have different genders\, different skin colors\, different sexual orientations.

right into the garbage can.
